definition: far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)
to walk (side part of split character)
to be far from/to keep away from
long-term/at a fixed date in the future (e.g. for repayment)/abbr. for 遠期合約|远期合约[yuan3 qi1 he2 yue1]
distant seas/the open ocean (far from the coast)

sentences.english: This event long antedates the arrival of Columbus in America.
sentences.chinese: 這件事的發生遠在哥倫布到達美洲之前。

sentences.english: But there is more to writing a good cover letter.
sentences.chinese: 但是想要寫出一封精彩的求職信遠沒有這麼簡單。

sentences.english: One day is hardly enough to show our gratitude。
sentences.chinese: 僅這一天遠不足以表達我們對您的感激之情。

sentences.english: The audio book with a live goose, Donglai not far from Penglai.
sentences.chinese: 好把音書憑過雁，東萊不似蓬萊遠。

sentences.english: We had not gone far before we saw the road blocked by a truck.
sentences.chinese: 我們還沒走多遠就看見路被一輛卡車擋住了。

sentences.english: I must wonder how far is too far when venturing into a virtual reality.
sentences.chinese: 我想知道當冒險進入虛擬現實時走多遠纔算可以？

sentences.english: Last night, I dream, you dreamed of a long run, how to catch up with recovery.
sentences.chinese: 我昨晚做夢，夢到你跑的好遠，怎麼追也追不上。

sentences.english: How can the earth pull on something from a distance, that it’s not even attached to?
sentences.chinese: 地球是怎樣隔着這麼遠“拉”動物體的呢？

sentences.english: By my reckoning we were seven or eight kilometres from Borj Mechaab.
sentences.chinese: 據我估計我們離梅卡巴堡有七八公里遠。

sentences.english: Aesthetics only gets you so far.
sentences.chinese: 美學只能帶你走那麼遠。

sentences.english: The Yuanxiang (Distant Fragrance) Hall at the center of the garden is the largest hall type architecture of the entire garden.
sentences.chinese: 園區中心的遠香堂是全園最大的廳堂式建築。

sentences.english: When it comes to sex, non-human animals are way more experimental than us.
sentences.chinese: 說到性，動物遠不及人類有實驗精神。

sentences.english: Watching her walk away, I felt the enchantment of the night begin to evaporate.
sentences.chinese: 看着她走遠，我頓感夜色的迷人開始消散。

sentences.english: Yes, but it's far away from here. You'd better take bus No. 69 to get there.
sentences.chinese: 是的，不過那兒離這有點遠，您可以乘69路車直達。

sentences.english: The Baleh river is far less wide than it is long.
sentences.chinese: 巴勒河的寬度遠不及它的長度。

sentences.english: In Wenchuan Earthquake, Xi'an city and Baoji city in Shaanxi Province are in areas with large epicentral distance.
sentences.chinese: 汶川地震中，陝西省西安市和寶雞市兩地處於遠震區。

definition: to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
feeling or desire to do sth/interest in sth/excitement
to rise/to flourish/to become popular/to start/to encourage/to get up/(often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect)/maybe (dialect)
to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)

to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor
(in the) past/former/previous/to go over/to pass by
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
